Package com.github.tadukoo.view.components.interfaces

Interface TComponent

All Superinterfaces:
HasSizablePaints, Shaped
All Known Subinterfaces:
TButton, TLabel
All Known Implementing Classes:
TadukooButton, TadukooLabel
public interface TComponent
extends HasSizablePaints, Shaped
Generic Interface to be used by Tadukoo Components. It extends both HasSizablePaints and Shaped, which most or all components will have. It also contains methods for grabbing proper Insets, based on using the ShapeInfo on these Components.
Version:
Alpha v.0.3
Author:
Logan Ferree (Tadukoo)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    javax.swing.border.Border getBorder()  
    default java.awt.Insets getProperInsets​(java.awt.Component c)
    Given the Component we're working with, will calculate the proper Insets for the Component, checking the Border and the ShapeInfo, if they're present.
    default java.awt.Insets getProperInsets​(java.awt.Component c, java.awt.Insets insets)
    Given the Component we're working with, will calculate the proper Insets for the Component, checking the Border and the ShapeInfo, if they're present.

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.tadukoo.view.components.interfaces.HasSizablePaints

    getBackgroundPaint, getForegroundPaint, setBackgroundPaint, setForegroundPaint

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.tadukoo.view.components.interfaces.Shaped

    getShapeInfo, setShapeInfo

    • getBorder

      javax.swing.border.Border getBorder()
      Returns:

    • getProperInsets

      default java.awt.Insets getProperInsets​(java.awt.Component c)
      Given the Component we're working with, will calculate the proper Insets for the Component, checking the Border and the ShapeInfo, if they're present.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getProperInsets

      default java.awt.Insets getProperInsets​(java.awt.Component c, java.awt.Insets insets)
      Given the Component we're working with, will calculate the proper Insets for the Component, checking the Border and the ShapeInfo, if they're present.
      Parameters:
      c - The Component we're working with
      insets - An Insets instance to be used
      Returns:
      The proper Insets for the Component
